backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with extensive type structures for lobbies, tournaments, player stats, transactions, game states, and storage mixins but with logic omitted/truncated.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI background gradient enhancement to affected frontend files and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend source file paths to short descriptive summaries of their functionality for build and planning use.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring providers, authentication, admin check, quick‑play routing, and tabbed navigation within a colorful gradient layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin settings UI with placeholders for future backend house‑cut updates and system statistics.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: Badge-based indicator showing backend connection status with retry feedback using useActorWithRetry.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal handling deposits and withdrawals, including Flexa deposit initiation, polling, status tracking, and wallet readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Help card explaining how to publish an app live on ICP and where to find public links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with game mode controls, wallet connect/disconnect, and deposit/withdraw modal triggers.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays current site origin, ICP public link, and build metadata with copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: UI for browsing lobbies and starting quick-play games, with matchmaking features marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder lobby room component showing that multiplayer rooms are under development.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating user profiles for online or offline play, handling username input, wallet/guest address setup, and saving profile data.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Wrapper component that initializes and manages quick-play sessions for Spades or Omaha, rendering the appropriate game UI and handling exits.
frontend/src/components/spades/SpadesSco: Displays Spades scores, penalties, and hand info in compact or full layouts with optional sticky positioning.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Static UI section displaying upcoming tournament features with different messaging for real-play and offline modes.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Modal for establishing a WalletConnect session, supporting QR codes, deep links, error handling, and auto-closing on success.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Modal prompting users to install a browser wallet extension with direct links to recommended wallets.
frontend/src/components/WalletPickerModa: Modal allowing users to choose a wallet provider or guest mode, invoking connection logic and handling errors.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Renders wallet and player stats, handling offline and on‑chain modes with balance, winnings, transactions, and deposit/withdraw modals.
Provides a React context exposing Web3 wallet connection state, actions, and availability checks.
frontend/src/games/omaha/bots.ts: Implements a simple randomized bot decision algorithm using basic checking, calling, betting, and folding logic.
frontend/src/games/omaha/engine.ts: Implements deck creation, shuffling, hand initialization, hand rotation, and core Omaha action rules and validation.
frontend/src/games/omaha/handEvaluator.t: Evaluates Omaha hands by checking all valid combinations and ranks five‑card hands to determine winners.
frontend/src/games/omaha/OmahaCommunityB: Shows Omaha community cards based on the current street with fallback messaging when cards are missing.
frontend/src/games/omaha/types.ts: Defines core Omaha types including cards, players, game state, and helpers for card formatting and suit color.
frontend/src/games/session/quickPlaySess: Manages creation and progression of quick-play sessions for Spades and Omaha, routing player and bot actions to the correct engine.
frontend/src/games/spades/bots.ts: Implements simple Spades bot logic for picking bids and choosing which card to play based on lead suit and legality.
frontend/src/games/spades/engine.ts: Handles Spades game initialization, deck management, hand dealing, bidding, and trick progression with scoring integration.
frontend/src/games/spades/scoring.ts: Defines scoring rules for Spades hands and utilities for checking target score and determining winners.
frontend/src/games/spades/types.ts: Provides TypeScript types for Spades cards, players, tricks, game state, and helpers for card display formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with connection state tracking, retry detection, and user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, canister build metadata, and Flexa deposit actions with mutation‑based updates and polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickPlaySession.t: Manages quick‑play game sessions including bot turn processing, game start, bidding, and card play logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnect.ts: Handles WalletConnect client initialization, connection flow, session state, errors, and balance queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Unified web3 wallet manager supporting injected wallets, WalletConnect, and guest mode with address, chain, and connection state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining light/dark themes, gradients, scrollbars, and playing card UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/walletconnect.ts: Implements a dynamic WalletConnect client for initializing, connecting, managing sessions, and sending requests.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Defines Base chain metadata and placeholders for future Web3Modal integration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Provides helpers for detecting canister IDs, generating IC links, and copying text to clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/sleep.ts: Exports a simple promise-based sleep utility.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and pending requests.
